Class Summary
AnimatedProgress Deprecated. As of Eclipse 2.1, use ProgressBar with the style SWT.INDETERMINATE Styles:VERTICAL, HORIZONTAL, BORDER
BidiSegmentEvent Unsafe:
BusyIndicator Unsafe: Support for showing a Busy Cursor during a long running process.
CCombo Safe: The CCombo class represents a selectable user interface object that combines a text field and a list and issues notificiation when an item is selected from the list.
CLabel Safe: A Label which supports aligned text and/or an image and different border styles.
ControlEditor Safe: A ControlEditor is a manager for a Control that appears above a composite and tracks with the moving and resizing of that composite.
CTabFolder Safe:
CTabFolderAdapter Unsafe:
CTabFolderEvent Unsafe:
CTabItem Safe:
DefaultContent  
DefaultLineStyler  
DisplayRenderer  
ExtendedModifyEvent Unsafe:
LineBackgroundEvent Unsafe:
LineStyleEvent Unsafe:
PopupList Safe: A PopupList is a list of selectable items that appears in its own shell positioned above its parent shell.
PrintRenderer  
SashForm Safe: The SashForm lays out its children in a Row or Column arrangement (as specified by the orientation) and places a Sash between the children.
ScrolledComposite Safe: A ScrolledComposite provides scrollbars and will scroll its content when the user uses the scrollbars.
ST Safe: This class provides access to the public constants provided by StyledText.
StackLayout Safe: This Layout stacks all the controls one on top of the other and resizes all controls to have the same size and location.
StyledText Safe: A StyledText is an editable user interface object that displays lines of text.
StyledTextBidi  
StyledTextEvent  
StyledTextListener  
StyledTextRenderer  
StyleRange Safe:
TableCursor Safe: A TableCursor provides a way for the user to navigate around a Table using the keyboard.
TableEditor Safe: A TableEditor is a manager for a Control that appears above a cell in a Table and tracks with the moving and resizing of that cell.
TableTree Safe:
TableTreeEditor Unsafe: A TableTreeEditor is a manager for a Control that appears above a cell in a TableTree and tracks with the moving and resizing of that cell.
TableTreeItem Safe: A TableTreeItem is a selectable user interface object that represents an item in a heirarchy of items in a TableTree.
TextChangedEvent Unsafe:
TextChangingEvent Unsafe:
TreeEditor Safe: A TreeEditor is a manager for a Control that appears above a cell in a Tree and tracks with the moving and resizing of that cell.
ViewForm Safe: Instances of this class implement a Composite that lays out three children horizontally and allows programmatic control of layout and border parameters.
WrappedContent An instance of class WrappedContent is used by StyledText to display wrapped lines.
 

Package org.eclipse.swt.custom Description

SWT Custom widgets.

Package Specification

This package contains the custom widgets which were written to provide the standard look and feel of the Eclipse platform.
